## hpr3203 :: The Paul Quirk show: Retro Computing

 Some links of interest for the listener:

Amiga emulation: https://fs-uae.net/
Commodore 8 bit emulation: https://vice-emu.sourceforge.io/
Atari emulation: https://hatari.tuxfamily.org/
Apple II emulation: https://apple2games.com/wiki/Apple_2_Emulators
A site for the Color Computer: https://cocoquest.com/
